titleStmt.title: The Jesuites policy to suppress monarchy proving out of their own writings that the Protestant religion is a sure foundation and principle of a true Christian / written by a person of honor.
titleStmt.author: Derby, Charles Stanley, Earl of, 1628-1672.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. [1]: A dialogue between Orthodox, a royalist, and Cacodæmon, one popishly affected.
Attributed to Derby by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
